Class Slave

java.lang.Object
Slave
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Slave
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
slave class implements the runnable interface to work as a slave thread

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private CircularBufferCoefficients sharedBufferCoefficients
    circular buffer to serve to insert the coefficients generated in the master thread into this thread
    private CircularBufferRoots sharedBufferRoots
    circular buffer to insert the solved roots from the slave class into the master thread
    private int slaveNo
    value for to holds the slave thread number
    private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> slaveThreads
    hash map to hold the slave thread number and the number of equations it has solved, it is static since this will keep track of the total number of slaves created and the number of equations each has solved

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Slave​(CircularBufferCoefficients circularBufferCoefficients, CircularBufferRoots sharedBufferRoots, int slaveNo)
    constructor that assigns the circular buffers for communication with main thread and also the slave number

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> getSlaveThreads()
    static method for the master to call in order to the hash map with the slave threads and the amount of equations each solved
    void run()
    overridden run method to solve the sets of coefficients that are inserted by the buffer and then pu the solved roots into the circularBufferRoots to insert them back into the master thread

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • sharedBufferCoefficients

      private final CircularBufferCoefficients sharedBufferCoefficients
      circular buffer to serve to insert the coefficients generated in the master thread into this thread

    • sharedBufferRoots

      private final CircularBufferRoots sharedBufferRoots
      circular buffer to insert the solved roots from the slave class into the master thread

    • slaveNo

      private int slaveNo
      value for to holds the slave thread number

    • slaveThreads

      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> slaveThreads
      hash map to hold the slave thread number and the number of equations it has solved, it is static since this will keep track of the total number of slaves created and the number of equations each has solved

  • Constructor Details

    • Slave

      public Slave​(CircularBufferCoefficients circularBufferCoefficients, CircularBufferRoots sharedBufferRoots, int slaveNo)
      constructor that assigns the circular buffers for communication with main thread and also the slave number
      Parameters:
      circularBufferCoefficients - circular buffer to insert the coefficients from the main thread to this slave thread
      sharedBufferRoots - circular buffer to insert the solved roots to the main thread
      slaveNo - slave thread number to distinguish it

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      overridden run method to solve the sets of coefficients that are inserted by the buffer and then pu the solved roots into the circularBufferRoots to insert them back into the master thread
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • getSlaveThreads

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> getSlaveThreads()
      static method for the master to call in order to the hash map with the slave threads and the amount of equations each solved
      Returns:
      hashmap holding all the created slave threads
